Summary: Orange / Red Glowing Orbs hovered for a few minutes then moved a bit blinked a few times and then just dissappeared
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Eagle
There were no other sightings in Eagle on or around January 18th 2013
divs: sighting detailsamount 8:45 pm (mountain time)on 1\18\2013 my husband and i went outside to go into our hot tub. my husband went straight out to the tub to remove the cover. as i steped out the door about a minute after him i looked straight out to the east and saw 4 orange\red orbs glowing brightly in the sky. i asked to him what are those lights? we both stopped and stared at the four glowing objects in the sky. as if they saw\heard us they started to retreat. one set at a time, they moved behind each other blinked a few times and then just disappeared into the night sky.
